item.title: CVE-2024-47644|2024-10-07T14:11:22.208Z -- copyscape%20%2F%20indigo%20stream%20technologies -- copyscape%20premium
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Copyscape / Indigo Stream Technologies Copyscape Premium allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Copyscape Premium: from n/a through 1.3.6.
